name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated Senior Frontend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in utilizing **React**, **TypeScript**, **Next.js**, and **TailwindCSS** to create high-performance, user-centric applications. My proficiency extends to building and integrating **RESTful APIs** and **GraphQL** services, ensuring seamless data flow and optimized performance. I am skilled in implementing CI/CD practices to enhance development efficiency and achieve clean, maintainable code. My testing expertise with tools like **Jest**, **React Testing Library**, and **Playwright** ensures quality assurance and application reliability.

Alongside my frontend focus, I have a solid foundation in full-stack development, with a strong grasp of **Python**, **Node.js**, and cloud technologies such as **AWS** and **Azure**. I bring experience in compliance across various standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS, and I have led the development of platforms that leverage AI/ML for enriching user experience. This combination of frontend specialization and versatile technical expertise allows me to drive innovative solutions in agile environments.
